headline.main: La Guardia and Baseball Chiefs Pay Tribute to Gehrig's Memory; Mayor Praises Civic Contributions of Former Ball Player -- Yankees Stunned by Passing of Ex-Tcam-Mate BASEBALL MEN PAY TRIBUTE TO GEHRIG

snippet: Civic officials joined with baseball executives and players last night in extolling the memory of Lou Gehrig. Mayor La Guardia, who appointed the ailing ball player to the New York City Parole Commission after his retirement from baseball, was amo...
